articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Coach Justin Langer not on panel to select Tim Paine's replacement as Australian Test captain
articles.description: Cricket Australia will soon name its 47th men's Test captain, having finalised the five-person panel that will mull whether to elevate Pat Cummins.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia has firmed up the process that is expected to result in Pat Cummins' ascension as the 47th captain of the national men's Test side.
<ul><li>Justin Langer will not sit on the five-p… [+3738 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Treatment of Paine has been 'appalling'
articles.description: The treatment of Tim Paine has been the "worst of an Australia Test captain in 50 years", says Cricket Tasmania.
articles.content:
The treatment of Tim Paine has been the "worst of an Australia Test captain in 50 years", says Cricket Tasmania.
Paine stepped down on Friday over an investigation into sexually explicit texts he se… [+2194 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
